hero.main_title: We develop the future of your company
hero.main_subtitle: Specialists in modernizing critical processes using Artificial Intelligence, high-standard connectivity, and advanced telemetry solutions
hero.video_overlay_desc: Master your fleet with a platform that converts real-time data into profitable decisions. Manage routes with precision from any device and ensure maximum operational efficiency.
hero.browser_support: Your browser does not support the video tag.

grid.whats_new: Take a look at what’s new.
grid.sentinel_subtitle: Reduce accidents and costs with AI that detects driver fatigue and distractions in real time. Protect your passengers and drivers with technology that anticipates risks before they occur.
grid.tel_subtitle: Maximize your fleet's lifespan by anticipating breakdowns and optimizing fuel consumption. Keep your buses always moving with preventive alerts that avoid unnecessary stops.

iot.title: IoT
iot.subtitle: Automate your assets' performance with sensors that reduce wear and energy expenditure. Turn your fleet into a smart network that elevates service quality and profitability.

totems.title: Interactive Totems
totems.subtitle: Eliminate lines with agile self-service that modernizes your terminals immediately. Provide total autonomy to the passenger to buy and print without waiting, streamlining your operation.

ecommerce.title: e-Commerce
ecommerce.subtitle: Scale your revenue with a platform that sells your tickets 24/7 automatically. Understand your customers' behavior and launch personalized campaigns that ensure full buses.

wifi.title: Urban WiFi
wifi.subtitle: Turn connectivity into your greatest competitive advantage with industrial-grade high-fidelity WiFi. Build passenger loyalty by offering a premium experience that keeps them always connected.

showcase.camera_desc: Optimize occupancy with AI that predicts peak seasons and adjusts your routes based on real demand. Ensure an intelligent service that builds customer loyalty and maximizes the performance of every trip.
showcase.battery_desc: Modernize your management with a strategic alliance that integrates talent and advanced technology into your DNA. We share your operational challenges to develop solutions that accelerate your company's growth.
showcase.chip_desc: Boost your telemetry and AI with the superior stability of Connect Plus fiber optics. Guarantee the performance of your critical operations with 24/7 support and an uninterrupted connection.

ai.title: WIT Assistant
ai.greeting: Hello! I'm your WIT Assistant. How can I help you today?
ai.mock_response_price: Our products start from $999. Would you like to see the pricing for a specific model?
ai.mock_response_mac: The new MacBook lineup features the M3 chip, delivering incredible performance and battery life.
ai.mock_response_iphone: iPhone 15 Pro features a titanium design and the groundbreaking A17 Pro chip.
ai.mock_response_vision: Apple Vision Pro seamlessly blends digital content with your physical space.
ai.mock_response_default: I can help you explore our latest products, find a store, or answer support questions. What would you like to know?

timeline.title: Our Impact History
timeline.description: Discover how we have transformed key industries in Chile through technological innovation and strategic alliances.

items.metro: Implementation of real-time monitoring systems to optimize passenger flow and reduce wait times during peak hours.
items.pullman: Fleet modernization with IoT sensors for predictive maintenance and improved road safety.
items.parque_arauco: Development of a data analysis platform to understand visitor behavior and personalize the shopping experience.
items.transantiago: Integration of advanced GPS for fleet tracking and route optimization in the public transport system.
items.claro: Strengthening 5G network infrastructure and deploying high-speed enterprise connectivity solutions.

dashboards.subtitle: Interactive dashboards that transform complexity into clarity, designed for immediate decision making.

reports.subtitle: Eliminate manual work. Schedule the delivery of critical information directly to your inbox or team.

kpis.subtitle: We define and visualize the key indicators that move the needle of your business.

reviews.title: Customer
reviews.subtitle: Our technology drives the success of leading companies in the Southern Cone.
reviews.score_desc: 98% of our strategic partners rate our services as hi-fi.

contact.hero_subtitle: We are here to help you drive your company into the future.
contact.support_desc: Get help with your Sentinel devices, MásGPS network configuration, or support on our BI and AI platforms.
contact.sales_desc: Talk to experts about how our technological solutions can scale the profitability of your operation.
contact.offices_desc: Visit us at our offices or contact us directly in your region.

security.title: Security and Accounts
security.desc: Manage your access and protect your data with the highest standards.

technical.title: Technical Support
technical.desc: Sentinel hardware troubleshooting and network configuration.

guides.title: Guides and Manuals
guides.desc: Learn how to get the most out of our BI and AI platforms.

warranty.title: Warranty and Services
warranty.desc: Information on WIT coverage and preventive maintenance.

support.cta_title: Can't find what you're looking for?
support.cta_desc: Our team of engineers is available to assist you personally.

offices.hero_subtitle: National presence to ensure the operational continuity of your IoT projects.

sales.subtitle: Discover how WIT solutions can transform the efficiency of your commercial and security operations.
sales.hablemos_desc: Our advisory team will get in touch to design a solution tailored to your needs.

powerbi.desc: Native integration with the Microsoft ecosystem. Visualize your Azure and Office 365 data with WIT intelligence.

tableau.desc: The leading visual analytics platform. Deep data exploration for curious and strategic minds.

looker.desc: Modernize your data architecture with Google Cloud. A unified view of your business metrics.

timeline.zap_desc: WIT is born with a vision: to connect what was previously invisible.
timeline.globe_desc: We deploy our first massive sensor network in Chilean mining.
timeline.target_desc: We integrate computer vision algorithms for real-time road safety.
timeline.shield_desc: We consolidate operations across Chile with 100% own technology.

carbon.desc_main: Our goal is for every sensor, server, and line of code at WIT to be 100% carbon neutral by the end of the decade.
carbon.desc_detail: We are modernizing our supply chain and optimizing the energy consumption of our IoT devices to lead Chile's sustainable transformation.

team.title: Leadership at WIT
team.subtitle: Our leaders share a common vision: to create a future where technology and humanity empower each other.

luis.name: Luis Tapia
luis.quote: Technology only matches when it solves real problems.
luis.bio: Visionary leader with over 17 years of experience in the Chilean tech sector. Luis has guided WIT since its inception, transforming it into a regional benchmark in IoT and Artificial Intelligence.

directivo.name: Management Team
directivo.quote: We expand horizons so that Chilean innovation reaches the whole world.
directivo.bio: Our management board combines decades of experience in corporate management and technological development, ensuring WIT maintains its standard of excellence in every market.

engineering.name: Head of Engineering
engineering.quote: Clean code, robust hardware, smart solutions.
engineering.bio: Leading the developers and engineers who build the core of WIT. Our engineering is recognized for its stability and massive scalability capacity.

operations.name: Head of Operations
operations.quote: Perfect implementation is our daily standard.
operations.bio: Ensuring WIT hardware works in the most extreme environments on the planet, from the Atacama Desert to the most complex logistics centers.

culture.empowerment_desc: At WIT, we understand that today's global challenges aren't solved with uniform thinking. Our strength lies in the diversity of our perspectives, backgrounds, and experiences.
culture.stats_desc: Our commitment to transparency and growth.

blocks.innovation_desc: At WIT, every team member has the freedom to propose radical innovations. We don't follow obsolete hierarchies; we follow the best idea, wherever it comes from.
blocks.wellbeing_desc: We understand that excellence comes from rest and balance. WIT adapts to your life, not the other way around. We encourage mental health and quality time away from screens.

final.title: We are WIT.
final.desc: Join us to build something that transcends code and machines.

template.cta_footer_desc: Contact our sales team for more information

sentinel.description: Advanced monitoring system with integrated AI

specs.label: Storage
specs.value: Unlimited Cloud or local up to 2TB
